channel.title: CVE Feed for CBC Co.,Ltd. -- NR4H, NR8H, NR16H series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CBC Co.,Ltd. -- NR4H, NR8H, NR16H series

item.title: CVE-2023-38585|2024-08-02T17:46:55.839Z -- cbc%20co.%2Cltd. -- nr4h%2C%20nr8h%2C%20nr16h%20series
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in the CBC products allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command on the device or alter its settings. As for the affected products/versions, see the detailed information provided by the vendor. Note that NR4H, NR8H, NR16H series and DR-16F, DR-8F, DR-4F, DR-16H, DR-8H, DR-4H, DR-4M41 series are no longer supported, therefore updates for those products are not provided.

item.title: CVE-2023-40158|2024-08-02T18:24:55.605Z -- cbc%20co.%2Cltd. -- nr4h%2C%20nr8h%2C%20nr16h%20series
item.description: Hidden functionality vulnerability in the CBC products allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command on the device or alter its settings. As for the affected products/versions, see the detailed information provided by the vendor. Note that NR4H, NR8H, NR16H series and DR-16F, DR-8F, DR-4F, DR-16H, DR-8H, DR-4H, DR-4M41 series are no longer supported, therefore updates for those products are not provided.

item.title: CVE-2023-40144|2024-08-02T18:24:55.653Z -- cbc%20co.%2Cltd. -- nr4h%2C%20nr8h%2C%20nr16h%20series
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in the CBC products allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command on the device or alter its settings. As for the affected products/versions, see the detailed information provided by the vendor. Note that NR4H, NR8H, NR16H series and DR-16F, DR-8F, DR-4F, DR-16H, DR-8H, DR-4H, DR-4M41 series are no longer supported, therefore updates for those products are not provided.
